text: Scutellastra granularis is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Patellidae, one of the families of true limpets. ==Description== ==Distribution== Scutellastra granularis, ventral view ==References== ==External links== * Category:Patellidae Category:Gastropods described in 1758 Category:Taxa named by Carl Linnaeus
title: Scutellastra granularis
